Articles.Content:
Hey Guys and Gals,

Back to Kerbal after a long pause. Initially stopped playing because I found the space-leg fiddling annoying. Now I see a lots of mods have come out to iron out the tedious parts. I just downloaded MechJeb as my first mod and am ready to give it a go, but, ahhhhh .... errrrr, well I am old    No idea how to install it!!!

Any one here has a clue?

TY and have a Powerful day!

37 minutes ago, Chameau said:

Hey Guys and Gals,

Back to Kerbal after a long pause. Initially stopped playing because I found the space-leg fiddling annoying. Now I see a lots of mods have come out to iron out the tedious parts. I just downloaded MechJeb as my first mod and am ready to give it a go, but, ahhhhh .... errrrr, well I am old    No idea how to install it!!!

Any one here has a clue?

TY and have a Powerful day!

Hello and welcome!  You should put it into the game data folder.
Kerbal Space Program -> Game Data -> drop mod folders here next to the Squad folder

TY guys!

done and done!

Do I have to restart a carrer or can i just pick up the ones i had previously?
Oh wait is this just available in sandbox mode?
You have to unlock the bits of MJ's tech in science or career, but it's in there as well
